author: goldbbb
content: Hey everyone, I'm David Goldberg. I was a software engineer at Salesforce for a while and spent a majority of 2018 auditing eth smart contracts. After that my co-founder and I decided to build a time series database that ended up getting acquired by Datadog late 2019. Now I'm working on an AI startup. I'm super excited about where the eth ecosystem is at and the community is as strong as ever. Pumped to be here!
